text: @JoeBiden You mean your hostage crisis. The whole COVID-19 pandemic is a hostage crisis that is being perpetuated by Democrat contrived pseudoscience to shut down good conservatives who believe in less government decision making for the people. We don't want to be your slaves Joe. Got that
